mapper.update: update s_user_info set user_school_id = #{userSchoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_stu_id = #{userStuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_gender = #{userGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id_card = #{userIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_lv = #{userLv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_money = #{userMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_integral = #{userIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_birth = #{userBirth,jdbcType=DATE}, user_motto = #{userMotto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_rank = #{userRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rank_date = #{rankDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_school_id, user_stu_id, user_gender, user_id_card, user_lv, user_money, user_integral, user_birth, user_motto, user_rank, rank_date from s_user_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_school_id, user_stu_id, user_gender, user_id_card, user_lv, user_money, user_integral, user_birth, user_motto, user_rank, rank_date from s_user_info
